text: Hear the voice of an angel, he's calling for you
When you think all is forsaken, listen to me now. You need never feel broken again. Sometimes darkness can show you the light
Rise up and conquer the world!
Let the good times rock the nation, keep the bad times out of sight.
With dreams to be a king, first one should be a Man
Unless there's someone like you who cares an awful lot, nothing's going to get better. It's not
Deeds will not be less valiant because they are unpraised.
It is the duty of those with strength to do something to act.
person: Tyrranus, Marquis Jackson (not a book, but a game)
